last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 12
last_episode_to_air.overview: A woman is taken hostage by a man on a suspected crime spree. A woman escapes a man who hit her with a gun. A man disarms an armed robber. A motorcyclist is hit by a driver. A woman fends off an attacker in a gym; and more.

name: I Survived a Crime
overview: A journey into the experience of being a victim of a sudden crime, from the moment those attacked first perceive the danger through the potential long-lasting effects. Using surveillance and cell phone footage captured during the crime, the series follows individuals going about their daily lives who were confronted with a dangerous situation and forced to make a quick decision on how to protect themselves or their families.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: "I Survived a Crime" takes viewers on a journey into the experience of being a victim of a sudden crime, from the moment those attacked first perceive the danger through the potential long-lasting effects.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: A local trip becomes a harrowing ordeal for one family when they're surrounded by an angry mob that attacks their vehicle; a laundromat owner is beaten by unruly patrons from the business next door; a property manager is confronted by a gunman

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: A thief with a knife and a big idea meets a store employee and his bigger blade; a ride share driver has his evening shattered as gunfire rips through his truck; a devious plot involving a bank teller and an ATM lead to a near death encounter

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: A family faces off with violent attackers trying to rob its jewelry store; two young women flee from a driver who is out to get them on a terrifying road trip; convenience and crime collide at a bank ATM.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: A gas station worker looks down the barrel of a gun and is ordered to empty her registers; a man running an errand goes on a high-speed chase to elude carjackers; a hotel worker thwarts a sexual predator who has six prior assaults

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: A retail store robber is outsmarted by the store clerk; a tense exchange at a convenience store as an employee tries to keep a gunman from shooting her; a man is beaten and then nearly electrocuted in a robbery gone off the rails; and more

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: An errant teen pulls a gun on a convenience store owner; a business owner dives through a truck window to thwart a carjacking; a prison librarian is held hostage by a desperate inmate; and more.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: A simple snack at a local restaurant turns violent when a grandmother is ripped off, but does not give up; a woman takes on the man who slammed into her van and then tried to run; an aggressive panhandler battles a baker over his dough.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: A brave grandma fights off two carjackers intent on stealing her truck; a homeowner faces off with an armed gang and uses his machete to turn the tables; two assailants pull a gun on a store manager, who escapes and locks the thieves inside.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: A typical Sunday morphs into a gunfight when two armed men invade a family's home; an unsuspecting impound lot worker checks out a disturbance and is nearly mowed down by an irate woman in a two-ton truck; a car owner tries to stop a carjacking.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: A woman attacks a bus driver in an out of control road rage incident; a man is beaten to within an inch of his life in a hate crime; a woman is brutally assaulted by her ex in a dollar store.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: Convenience store customers witness a cold-blooded murder and are barricaded inside the store by a gunman; a restaurant worker is robbed at gunpoint but is saved by a drive through customer; a bartender argues with her irate boss who pounces on her.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: A woman is held hostage in a terrifying home invasion; a man stops a carjacking by using an unusual weapon against his attackers; a convenience store clerk uses his martial arts training to stave off a robber.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: A longstanding feud comes to a head when two neighbours confront each other with guns; a school bus driver goes on a dangerous high-speed chase to outrun an irate parent who attacks her bus with a hammer.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: A robber and a jewellery store owner get into a wild west style shootout; a stay at home mum confronts a coffee shop clerk who used her credit card; a father and son fight back against a robbery at gunpoint.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: A young woman is brutally attacked on the train by an assailant intent on killing her; a coach witnesses a student with a gun roam the hall and helps avert a potential school shooting; a store clerk faces a suspect trying to rob him with an unusual weapon until he turns the tables with his own weapon; and more.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: An auto parts store owner turns the tables on an armed assailant by taking his gun; an armored car driver survives a terrifying attack; a hotel clerk flips the script on an armed robber; and more.

episodes.name: Episode 17
episodes.overview: A motorcyclist is bumped off his bike by an angry motorist; a bartender is choked by her enraged boss; a serial convenience store thief makes peace with the irate owner he stole from. And more.

episodes.name: Episode 18
episodes.overview: A man confronts a group of young adults about smoking on the train and is nearly beaten to death; a rideshare driver picks up a sick man, but a traffic jam throws the ailing man into a violent frenzy; a woman is confronted by a knife wielding man at her place of work; and more.

episodes.name: Episode 19
episodes.overview: A retail store worker puts her life on the line to save a prized puppy stolen before her very eyes; a homeowner witnesses his family held at gunpoint and fights back against the assailants; a woman working at her family business battles a knife-wielding assailant who demands money; and more.

episodes.name: Episode 20
episodes.overview: A protective father fends off a would-be home invader with a shovel; a street fight over a parking spot turns into an action film-like disaster for a bakery owner; a robber throws gasoline on a clerk, threatening to light him on fire.

episodes.name: Assaulted at Work
episodes.overview: A disgruntled renter pulls a gun on an apartment manager and shoots him in a fit of rage; a fast food worker is assaulted by an unhinged customer; a bar owner chokes his employee until her terrified daughter intervenes; and more.

episodes.name: Get Out of My House
episodes.overview: Intruders wake sleeping homeowners and a deadly shootout ensues; a model and her husband are robbed at gunpoint and dodge a barrage of bullets; a man sitting in his yard holds armed robbers at bay with a machete until police arrive; and more.

episodes.name: Armed Robberies
episodes.overview: Survivors tell their tales of crimes involving armed robbery.

episodes.name: Snap Judgment
episodes.overview: Survivors tell their tales of crimes involving snap judgements of the mind.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: "I Survived a Crime" takes viewers on a journey into the experience of being a victim of a sudden crime, from the moment those attacked first perceive the danger through the potential long-lasting effects.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: A motorist in road rage overdrive runs down a woman photographing his license plate; a woman's ex-boyfriend tries to storm her home and is gunned down; several women at a fast food restaurant riot after being charged extra for special sauce.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: A man brutally attacks multiple people during an auto store robbery; a woman with an unusual weapon fends off an alleged serial thief; a woman is carjacked by a wanted fugitive in the middle of a shootout with police; and more.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: A driver fires his gun wildly during a road rage incident; two men are assaulted by an angry sheriff and his brother while ordering food; a soccer referee is tackled by a parent.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: A mother and child are hit by a driver; a shopper is attacked by a customer, but store employees jump in to help; a woman walking her dog faces off against purse snatchers.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: A horrified family watches remotely on an alarm app as their teens are held at gunpoint. A lottery store is looted in a brazen robbery. Workers at a fast food restaurant fight back against irate customers; and more.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: A woman is trapped in the backseat of her car after a man steals her vehicle and leads police on a wild chase. A man's neighbour is forced to intervene after an arsonist attempts to burn his home down. A woman bites her rideshare driver; and more.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: A family's jewellery store is targeted by would be smash and grab robbers. A gunfight breaks out as a war veteran defends his home. A man survives an attack by suspected car jackers and run over. A lunch patron is attacked.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: A man is followed home and attacked by would-be robbers; a minor fender bender escalates into a racially driven assault; a man attempts to kidnap a child right in front of her own home.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: A man scares off a robber, who then leads police on a chase; a man is caught in the middle of a shootout and avoids harm; a woman and her three children evade a violent kidnapper; a woman and her father are taken hostage in their own home.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: A wedding reception is brought to an early end by a man with a gun; a bartender is confronted by her ex who attempts to shoot her, but bystanders intervene; a woman is continually harassed by her upstairs neighbor until it escalates to violence.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: A shop owner turns the tables during an armed robbery. An irate airline passenger attacks an elderly man. A man is accosted in his apartment complex by a group of carjackers who try to mow him down; and more.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: A woman is taken hostage by a man on a suspected crime spree. A woman escapes a man who hit her with a gun. A man disarms an armed robber. A motorcyclist is hit by a driver. A woman fends off an attacker in a gym; and more.
